title: Kings.Bounty.Warriors.of.The.North.Ice.and.Fire.DLC.Update.v1.2.
description:
Battery



bumax[BAFH]



King's Bounty: Warriors of the North - Ice and Fire Update v1.2.1 (c) 1C Company

Release Date: 21/05/2014 Protection: Steam



Cracked By: BAT-TEAM # of Files: few



A text list of fixes/updates is included in the pack

Main game from FLT and RELOADED DLC release are needed

in order to use this update



A small island lost in the sea is covered by snow and ice

It is inhabited by the clan of Snow Elves. Young Olaf, the

son of the Northling King, faces his destiny again as he

helps the people of the North in their struggle against

the upcoming thaw



New adventures and challenges, new friends and foes, new

items and awards await Olaf on his way to victory. He will

set off on a journey to distant parts of Endoria that

weren't visited even by the Royal Bounty Hunters



1. Unpack release

2. Install the update to where you installed the game

3. Copy the cracked content from /Crack dir to the

same place

4. Enjoy! ;)



WE DONT WANT ANYONE TO CONTACT US!

WE CONTACT YOU IF NEEDED!

Greetings to all of our friends around scene!
